import { Button, TextField, Typography } from '@mui/material' import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' const ForgotPassword = () => { const [email, setEmail] = useState() const [sendEmail, setSendEmail] = useState(false) const handleSubmit = () => { console.log(email) } return ( <> {sendEmail ?
Forgot Password setEmail(e.target.value)} /> :

Please check you email to reset password.
Go to Sign in Screen

} ) } export default ForgotPassword
